official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to States for the preservation of low income housing.
short_title: Low Income Housing Preservation Act of 1988

summary.text: Low Income Housing Preservation Act of 1988 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to States to purchase and maintain eligible low-income housing. Authorizes FY 1989 through 1991 appropriations.

titles.title: Low Income Housing Preservation Act of 1988
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to States for the preservation of low income housing.
